name: Mid Night At School
description:
Story : You're A Student Who Overslept During Math Class And No One Bothered To Wake You Up(Probably Because you Have No Friends), Unfortunately The Night Robot Guard Is Still In Probation And It Still Can't Distinguish Between People, You Must Find The Key To The Exit And Escape As Quickly As Possible Before It Catches You.

This Game Was Made As An Entry To : My First  : Jam Summer 2021  Game Jam, This Is My First PC Game Release So It Probably Has A Lot Of Errors And I will Try To Fix Them As Soon As Possible :), Also This Game Was Inspired By 3:00  AM At The Krusty Krab, If you Liked This Game Check It Out.
